title: I'm not receiving any calls anymore from UAE since almost 2 weeks ago.
content:
I got my pixel from USA by end of Dec. 2019 and now I'm in egypt using it since January 2020 and the issue appeared as i know like 10 days ago I'm not receiving any phone calls from abroad (specifically UAE because i received already from England and USA) not even appear as missed calls while the caller keeps hearing the ring as if its ringing at my side till the end
I tried the sim card in my old HTC phone its working well and i received the calls perfectly
I made soft reset to all app setting and permissions and network also but same issue
I contracted my service provider and after reseting my APN they confirmed that there's nothing wrong from there side and i tried contacting support i cant request a call from my phone as attached?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
